amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 116-42 to require the administration produce a report examining the effect of the Paris Climate Agreement on clean energy job development in rural communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kuster (NH) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Kuster (NH).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kuster (NH) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
